_comment: ## Книга призыва - также содержит сообщения, запускаемые в связанных сетевых сообщенияхs
item.occultism.book_of_calling.message_t: Этот дух в настоящее время не связан с этой книгой. Щелкните правой кнопкой мыши по духу, чтобы привязать его к этой книге.
Этот дух теперь связан с этой книгой.
Этот дух не может быть связан с этой книгой - книга призвания должна соответствовать требоанию духа!
item.occultism.book_of_calling.message_s: Дух, связанный с этой книгой, не обитает здесь.
%s теперь внесет депозит в %s со стороны: %s
%s теперь будем извлекать из %s со стороны: %s
%s теперь будет принимать заказы на работу от %s
Связал стабильную червоточину с этим приводом хранилища.
item.occultism.storage_remote.message.no: Чанк для накопителя привода не загружен!
item.occultism.divination_rod.message.no: Жезл прорицания не настроен ни на какой материал.
С этим блоком нет никакого резонанса.
item.occultism.soul_gem.message.entity_t: Камень души не может содержать этот тип существа.
item.occultism.book_of_binding_foliot.to: Эта книга еще не была привязана к foliot.
item.occultism.book_of_binding_bound_fol: Может быть использован для вызова foliot %s
item.occultism.book_of_binding_djinni.to: Эта книга не была связана с djinni.
item.occultism.book_of_binding_bound_dji: Может быть использован для вызова djinni %s
item.occultism.book_of_binding_afrit.too: Эта книга еще не была привязана к afrit.
item.occultism.book_of_binding_bound_afr: Может быть использован для вызова afrit %s
item.occultism.book_of_binding_marid.too: Эта книга еще не была привязана к marid.
item.occultism.book_of_binding_bound_mar: Может быть использован для вызова marid %s
_comment:: block, because it's a block item.

item.occultism.divination_rod.tooltip.no: Не настроена ни на какой материал..
item.occultism.miner_foliot_unspecialize: %s будет добывать случайные блоки в измерении майнинга.
item.occultism.miner_djinni_ores.tooltip: %s будет добывать случайные руды в измерении добычи.
item.occultism.miner_debug_unspecialized: Отладочный шахтер будет добывать случайные блоки в измерении добычи.
item.occultism.soul_gem.tooltip_empty: Используйте на существе, чтобы поймать существо.
ritual.occultism.does_not_exist: §lНе известный ритуал§r. Убедитесь, что пентакли и ингредиенты настроены правильно. Если у вас все равно не получается, то присоединяйтесь к нашему Дискорд серверу https://invite.gg/klikli

gui.occultism.spirit.transporter.tag_fil:
Введите теги для фильтрации, разделенные ";".
E.g.: "forge:ores;*logs*".
Use "*" чтобы соответствовать любому символу, например "*ore*" чтобы соответствовать тегам руды из любого мода.
gui.occultism.storage_controller.shift: Зажмите Shift чтобы увидеть подробную информацию.
Префикс @: Для поиска по мод id.
Clear the text with a right-click.
Do not sync search with JEI.
advancements.occultism.root.title: Оккультизм
jei.occultism.ingredient.tallow.descript: Убивайте животных, таких как §2Свиней§r, §2Коров§r, §2Овец§r, §2Лошадей§r и §2Лам§r Мясницким ножом, чтобы получить жир.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherstone.desc: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherworld_sapl: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherworld_leav: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.iesnium_ore.des: Found in the nether. Only visible while the status §6Third§r §6Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary§r §6of§r §6Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.spirit_fire.des: Throw §6Demon's Dream Fruit§r to the ground and light it on fire. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.error.pentacle_not_loaded: The pentacle could not be loaded.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.require_sacrifi: This ritual requires a sacrifice to start. Please refer to the Dictionary of Spirits for detailed instructions.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.require_item_us: This ritual requires to use a specific item to start. Please refer to the Dictionary of Spirits for detailed instructions.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.none.tooltip: This ritual does not create any items.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_dimens: The dimensional matrix is the entry point to a small dimension used for storing items.
Allows miner spirits to enter the mining dimension and bring back resources.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_infuse: These lenses are used to craft spectacles that give thee ability to see beyond the physical world.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_miner_: Summon Djinni Ore Miner into a magic lamp.
Summon Foliot Miner into a magic lamp.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_satche: This satchels allows to store more items than it's size would indicate, making it a practical traveller's companion.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_soul_g: The soul gem allows the temporary storage of living beings.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_stabil: The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_stable: The stable wormhole allows access to a dimensional matrix from a remote destination.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_storag: The storage actuator base imprisons a Foliot responsible for interacting with items in a dimensional storage matrix.
The Storage Accessor can be linked to a Storage Actuator to remotely access items.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_oth: Drikwings will provide their owner with limited flight abilities when nearby.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_par: Parrot familiars behave exactly like tamed parrots.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.possess_ende: The possessed Enderman will always drop at least one ender pearl when killed.
The possessed Endermite drops End Stone.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.possess_skel: The possessed Skeleton is immune to daylight and always drop at least one Skeleton Skull when killed.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_afrit: Summons an bound Afrit that creates rain.
Summons an bound Afrit that creates a thunderstorm.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_djinn: Summons a Djinni that clears the weather.
Summons a Djinni that sets the time to high noon.
The machine operator automatically transfers items between Dimensional Storage Systems and connected Inventories and Machines.
Summons a Djinni that sets the time to midnight.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_folio: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively doubling the metal output.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_djinn: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_afrit: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_marid: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_folio: The lumberjack will harvest trees in it's working area and deposit the dropped items into the specified chest.
The otherstone trader trades normal stone for otherstone.
he otherworld sapling trader trades natural otherworld saplings for stable ones, that can be harvested without the third eye.
The transporter will move all items it can access from one inventory to another, including machines.
The janitor will pick up dropped items and deposit them into a target inventory.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_wild_: Summons an unbound Afrit that can be killed to obtain Afrit Essence
The Wild Hunt consists of Wither Skeletons that are guaranteed to drop Wither Skeleton Skulls, and their minions.
Summons a Drikwing Familiar that can be tamed by anyone, not just the summoner.
Summons a Parrot that can be tamed by anyone, not just the summoner.
